title: Which of the following is correct? (Choose 2)

choices.a: A class can extend more than one class.
choices.b: A class can implement more than one class.
choices.c: A class can extend more than one interface.
choices.d: A class can implement more than one interface.
choices.e: An interface can extend more than one interface.
choices.f: An interface can implement more than one interface.
